page.title: 12Cubs
page.content: We have a{Cub meeting}one evening a week.My pack has{16 boys.}We call our leaders Arkala, Barloo and Sherkhan from the "Jungle book" stories. { Inspection}comes first, when our uniforms are checked and our hands(to see that they are clean).Each sixer (group of 6 cubs)tries to be the best. Then we play some group{games}for a little while. { Badge work}comes next.We discuss the badges we are trying for and what we have to do.I liked the mapreading one. In summer we often meet outside to play games like{cricket;}or have a {camp fire}and cook our own supper. And we have a{cub camp}that lasts for several days. I like sleeping in a tent with my friends! At the end of the meeting we join in a circle to{sing}some cub songs before we are dismissed by Arkala.
